meanings.definition: Resembling an ostrich in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The tall man had an ostrichlike stride, taking long steps with his arms swinging.
meanings.sent2: The large bird had an ostrichlike neck, stretching out gracefully to reach for food.
meanings.sent3: The ostrichlike cat tried to hide its head under the sofa, thinking it was invisible.
meanings.sent4: Her ostrichlike speed in finishing the race left everyone amazed.
meanings.sent5: The ostrichlike feathers of the costume made the dancer look majestic on stage.

meanings.definition: Showing characteristics similar to those of an ostrich.
meanings.sent1: The curious child had an ostrichlike curiosity, always wanting to explore new things.
meanings.sent2: The ostrichlike behavior of the dog made everyone laugh as it tried to run with its head held high.
meanings.sent3: The ostrichlike student kept burying their head in books, trying to absorb all the knowledge.
meanings.sent4: His ostrichlike stubbornness in arguments made it hard to change his mind.
meanings.sent5: The ostrichlike gaze of the owl seemed to pierce through the darkness of the night.
